content.question: public class Thing{public void talk(){System.out.print("Hello ");} public void name(){System.out.print("my friend");} public void greet(){talk();name();}/* Constructors not shown */}Which of the following code segments, if located in a method in a class other than Thing, will cause the message "Hello my friend" to be printed?

choices.label: Thing a = new Thing(); a.name(); a.talk();

skill.text: 3.B: Determine the result or output based on code that contains data abstractions.
